p: All statistical analyses were performed in R language (R Foundation for Statistical Computing, Vienna, Austria). All logistic models were fitted using the “bayesglm” function in the “arm” package in R. 25 The “bayesglm” method, developed by Gelman et al, 26 takes a Bayesian approach to obtain stable logistic regression coefficients using weakly informative priors (the default prior is a Cauchy distribution).
